code: import{INCREMENT_CELL,CREATE_MATRIX,REMOVE_ROW,ADD_ROW,SET_NEAREST_IDS,RESET_NEAREST_IDS,SET_SETTINGS,REBUILD_MATRIX,RESET_SETTINGS}from"./action_types";export var setSettings=function setSettings(settings){return{type:SET_SETTINGS,settings:settings};};export var resetSettings=function resetSettings(){return{type:RESET_SETTINGS};};export var createMatrix=function createMatrix(){return{type:CREATE_MATRIX};};export var rebuildMatrix=function rebuildMatrix(){return{type:REBUILD_MATRIX};};export var incrementCell=function incrementCell(id,value){return{type:INCREMENT_CELL,id:id,value:value};};export var removeRow=function removeRow(rowCount){return{type:REMOVE_ROW,rowIndex:rowCount-1};};export var addRow=function addRow(){return{type:ADD_ROW};};export var setNearestIds=function setNearestIds(id){return{type:SET_NEAREST_IDS,id:id};};export var resetNearestIds=function resetNearestIds(){return{type:RESET_NEAREST_IDS};};
